information: The maximum number of points is 15. Those are the cross-code-review and cross-check criterias:

criteria.text: Redux is integrated into the app with the help of Redux Toolkit
Search is saved in the store
Items per page is saved in the store
Loading indicators are shown, loading flags are saved in the store
When either search or items per page is changed, the application makes a new call using RTK Query to fetch the data
Tests had been modified to test the functionality using Redux and RTK Query
Direct DOM manipulations inside the React components
Presence of code-smells (God-object, chunks of duplicate code), commented code sections
Usage of component libraries, e.g. Material UI, Ant Design
